column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Since I wasn't feeling Ramen
column2: I had to venture out. I went with the California Poke Bowl - Regular size. Honestly
column3: it blew my mind. It was super tasty and yummy. All the ingredients tasted fresh. Only downside is I totally could of just gotten the small because the regular was way too big. On the plus side
column4: next time in my wife and I will just share the regular because it's perfect for two.
